data.title: The Match Factory
data.text:
News

THE MATCH FACTORY at TIFF 2024

49. Toronto Film Festival

We are thrilled to be a part of TIFF again! These films will be playing in the following sections:

Special Presentations:

THE END by Joshua Oppenheimer

HARVEST by Athina Rachel Tsangari

THE GIRL WITH THE NEEDLE by Magnus von Horn

Midnight Madness:

THE SUBSTANCE by Coralie Fargeat

Centrepiece:

EDGE OF NIGHT by Türker Süer

Wavelengths:

GRAND TOUR by Miguel Gomes

THE MATCH FACTORY at Venice 2024

81. Venice Film Festival

We are thrilled that three of our films will premiere in Venice.

Competition:

HARVEST by Athina Rachel Tsangari

Orizzonti Extra:

EDGE OF NIGHT by Türker Süer

Giornate Degli Autori:

SANATORIUM UNDER THE SIGN OF THE HOURGLASS by the Quay Brothers

THE MATCH FACTORY Two awards at Cannes Film Festival

77. Cannes Film Festival

Coralie Fargeat could take home the Best Screenplay Award for THE SUBSTANCE & Miguel Gomes won Best Director for GRAND TOUR. Congratulations!

THE MATCH FACTORY at Cannes 2024

77. Cannes Film Festival

We are happy to unveil our amazing Cannes Line-Up with films in the following sections:

Competition:

THE GIRL WITH THE NEEDLE, by Magnus von Horn

GRAND TOUR, by Miguel Gomes

MOTEL DESTINO, by Karim Aïnouz

THE SUBSTANCE, by Coralie Fargeat

Un Certain Regard:

SEPTEMBER SAYS, by Ariane Labed

THE MATCH FACTORY at 74th Berlinale

74. Berlinale 2024

Proudly, we present our Berlinale Line-Up, including films in the following sections:

Competition:

ARCHITECTON, by Victor Kossakovsky

DYING, by Matthias Glasner

Panorama:

SCORCHED EARTH, by Thomas Arslan

Generation Kplus:

ABOVE THE DUST, by Wang Xiaoshuai

THE MATCH FACTORY at Tokyo International Film Festival

Tokyo International Film Festival 2023

Four of our titles made it in the 36th Tokyo International Film Festival's Selection:

Competition:

BLIND AT HEART, by Barbara Albert

Opening Film:

PERFECT DAYS, by Wim Wenders

Gala Selection:

KIDNAPPED, by Marco Bellocchio

World Focus:

SORCERY, by Christopher Murray

THE MATCH FACTORY at Toronto International Film Festival 2023

Toronto International Film Festival 2023

We’re thrilled to announce our line-up at Toronto International Film Festival.

Platform:

I TOLD YOU SO, by Ginevra Elkann

Special Presentations:

MEMORY, by Michel Franco

LA CHIMERA, by Alice Rohrwacher

KIDNAPPED, by Marco Bellocchio

Centrepiece:

PERFECT DAYS, by Wim Wenders

FALLEN LEAVES, by Aki Kaurismäki

THE MATCH FACTORY at Venice Film Festival 2023

Venice International Film Festival 2023

We are very excited to unveil new films at the upcoming Venice Film Festival!

The films will screen in the following sections:

Competition:

PRISCILLA, by Sofia Coppola

MEMORY, by Michel Franco

Orizzonti:

GASOLINE RAINBOW, by Bill Ross IV and Turner Ross

THE MATCH FACTORY at Cannes 2023

76. Festival de Cannes 2023

We are very excited to unveil our line-up for the upcoming Festival de Cannes! The films will screen in the following sections:

COMPETITION:

FALLEN LEAVES, by Aki Kaurismäki

LA CHIMERA, by Alice Rohrwacher

KIDNAPPED, by Marco Bellocchio

PERFECT DAYS, by Wim Wenders

DIRECTOR'S FORTNIGHT:

THE SWEET EAST by Sean Price Williams

CANNES PREMIERE:

LOST IN THE NIGHT, by Amat Escalante

THE MATCH FACTORY at Berlinale 2023

73. Berlinale 2023

We are very pleased to have a formidable seven films at this year's 73rd Berlinale, with four German titles in Competition.

COMPETITION:

AFIRE, by Christian Petzold

INGEBORG BACHMANN - JOURNEY INTO THE DESERT, by Margarethe von Trotta

SOMEDAY WE WILL TEACH EACH OTHER EVERYTHING, by Emily Atef

TILL THE END OF THE NIGHT, by Hochhäusler

ENCOUNTERS:

THE ECHO, by Tatiana Huezo

FAMILY TIME, by Tia Kouvo

PANORAMA:

SISI & I, by Frauke Finsterwalder
